# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 60, textsize[1] + 60) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (715 > wsizex): wsizex = 728 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize #self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 200) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(145, textsize[1] + 70)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window #newwidth = wsize[0] #self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
